componentsText.exampleReduxUsageTitleText: A simple example for using React Redux / Redux Toolkit
componentsText.exampleToastUsageTitleText: A simple example for using React-Toastify
componentsText.exampleCustomFilterCompUsageTitleText: A simple example for using Custom Filter Component
componentsText.appNewName: Enter new name in the app
componentsText.enterTextForTheSnackbar: Enter text for the button snackbar
componentsText.autoSelectDisableCloseOnSelectPropDescTe: Do not close the dropdown after a value is selected.
componentsText.autoSelectClearOnEscapePropDescText: Clear the value when the escape key is pressed while the input is focused and a value is selected.
componentsText.autoSelectDisableClearablePropDescText: Hide the clear icon in the input.
componentsText.autoSelectDisableListWrapPropDescText: Do not wrap around the list items when navigating with the keyboard arrows, i.e., pressing up arrow on the first item should not move to the last item, and vice versa.
componentsText.autoSelectDisabledPropDescText: Input and pop-up window get disabled.
componentsText.autoSelectClearOnBlurPropDescText: Clear the value if it does not match any of the items in the dropdown when the input loses focus.
componentsText.autoSelectAutoCompletePropDescText: Display the focused item in the input while navigating through the dropdown with the keyboard.
componentsText.autoSelectAutoHighlightPropDescText: Highlight the first item when the dropdown is opened.
componentsText.autoSelectSelectOnFocusPropDescText: Select the entire text in the input when it is focused, provided there is text in the input.
componentsText.autoSelectGroupByPropDescText: Sort the elements in the popup window by the first character.
componentsText.autoSelectCustomRenderOptionPropDescText: The contents of the elements in the pop-up window should have the name-surname part highlighted.
componentsText.autoSelectGetOptionDisabledPropDescText: Disable the selected item in the dropdown.
componentsText.autoSelectAddNewItemPropDescText: Allow the value typed in the input by keyboard to be added to the dropdown items if it does not match any existing items.

sectionAuthText.signInDesc: Sign in to your account to continue
sectionAuthText.resetPasswordDesc: Create a new password to continue
sectionAuthText.forgotPasswordDesc: To continue, first enter your email address in the required field and click submit. Then open the link to your email and create a new password.
sectionAuthText.iWantToBeAMember: I want to be a member

validationTexts.maxPassword: The password must be at most {{number}} characters long.
validationTexts.minName: The name must be at least {{number}} characters long.
validationTexts.maxName: The name must be at most {{number}} characters long.
validationTexts.minSurname: The surname must be at least {{number}} characters long.
validationTexts.maxSurname: The surname must be at most {{number}} characters long.
validationTexts.notValidPhoneNumber: The phone number is not valid.
validationTexts.nonZeroFirstDigitPhone: The phone number cannot start with 0.
validationTexts.onlyNumbersPhone: The number should only consist of numbers.
validationTexts.numberOfDigitsInTheNumberPhone: Phone number should consist of {{number}} digits
